duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to acquire new business and maintain client relationships.
Network and build a client portfolio through face-to-face meetings and industry events.
Utilize CRM platform to manage client acquisition and maintain customer relationships.
Lead and mentor a team of sales professionals, driving performance and achieving sales targets.
Analyze market trends, customer behavior, and competitor activity to identify growth opportunities and refine sales strategies.
Measure and report on the performance of sales efforts, using data-driven insights to continuously improve strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
